messages.message: Opslagstavlen giver dig de nyeste informationer fra PlayStations verden, bl.a. systemsoftwareopdateringer . For at starte den skal du gå til Netværk - [Information Board] og derefter trykke på X-tasten .
Information Board bietet aktuelle Informationen rund um PlayStation. Dazu gehören auch Systemsoftware-Updates. [Information Board] wird unter Netzwerk mit der X-Taste gestartet.
Information Board brings you the latest information on the world of PlayStation, including system software updates. To start, go to Network - [Information Board] and then press the X button.

Information Board te proporciona la información más actual disponible sobre PlayStation , incluidas las actualizaciones del software del sistema . Para comenzar, ve a Red - [Information Board] y, a continuación, pulsa el botón X .
Information Board kertoo uusimmat tiedot PlayStationin maailmasta, mukaan lukien laiteohjelmiston päivityksistä . Aloita siirtymällä kohtaan Verkko - [Information Board] ja painamalla X-näppäintä .

Grâce à la fonction Information Board , vous pouvez accéder à toutes les infos PlayStation , notamment aux mises à jour du logiciel système . Pour commencer, rendez-vous sur Réseau - [Information Board] , puis appuyez sur la touche X .

Grazie a Information Board potrai essere sempre aggiornato sulle ultime novità dal mondo PlayStation , inclusi gli aggiornamenti del software di sistema . Per accedere a questa funzione, vai su Rete - [Information Board] e premi il tasto X .
Information Board brings you the latest information on the world of PlayStation, including system software updates. To start, go to Network - [Information Board] and then press the X button.
Information Board brings you the latest information on the world of PlayStation, including system software updates. To start, go to Network - [Information Board] and then press the X button.

Met Information Board krijg je toegang tot de nieuwste informatie uit de wereld van PlayStation , inclusief updates van de systeemsoftware . Ga om te beginnen naar Netwerk - [Information Board] en druk vervolgens op de X-toets .

Information Board gir deg den nyeste informasjonen om PlayStation -verdenen, inkludert systemprogramvareoppdateringer . Gå til Nettverk - [Information Board] , og trykk deretter på X-knappen for å starte.

Information Board apresenta-te as mais recentes informações do mundo PlayStation , incluindo actualizações do software de sistema . Para iniciares, acede a Rede - [Information Board] e, em seguida, prime o botão X .
Information Board brings you the latest information on the world of PlayStation, including system software updates. To start, go to Network - [Information Board] and then press the X button.

Information Board ger dig den senaste informationen från PlayStation , inklusive uppdateringar av systemprogramvaran . Starta genom att gå till Nätverk - [Information Board] och tryck sedan på X-knappen .
Information Board brings you the latest information on the world of PlayStation, including system software updates. To start, go to Network - [Information Board] and then press the X button.
Information Board brings you the latest information on the world of PlayStation, including system software updates. To start, go to Network - [Information Board] and then press the X button.
